sentences.english: Shangshan, where the township government is now located, was just a hamlet in Xiuning County in ancient time.
sentences.chinese: 商山是休宁县古时的一个村落，现为乡政府所在地。

sentences.english: Xikou town lies in Xiuning county , as a result , Xikou dialect belongs to Xiuyi area of Hui dialect.
sentences.chinese: 溪口镇隶属休宁县，溪口方言属于徽语的休黟片。
